Package org.drooms.impl.logic

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    CollectibleRelated
    States that a certain event or a command is related to a Collectible.
    PlayerRelated
    States that a certain event or a command is related to a Player's worm.
    RewardRelated
    States that a certain event or a command is related to a Player reward expressed with points.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    CommandDistributor
    Receives state changes (Commands) from the GameController and distributes them to all the player strategies (DecisionMaker to process them and make Move decisions on them.
    DecisionMaker
    Represents a Player's Strategy in action.
    PathTracker
    A helper class for the strategies to be able to quickly and easily find paths from one Node to another.
